BBEX3.A.BZD.USD.CA.AC.A04: Exchange rates for the US dollar in Belize / USD 1 = BZD ... (middle)
General: Since 14 May 1976, the Belize dollar has been pegged to the US dollar at the rate of USD 1 = BZD 2.
Source: Since 2010: Central Bank of Belize, Belize City. Until 2009: Atlantic Bank Limited and The Monetary Authority of Belize, Belize City.
